article_text: In a strip mall on a busy road in this fast-growing city, signs of hope emerge for Republicans trying to win the White House. Spend a little time at Melao Bakery or Espiritu De Vida bookstore, ask about Marco Rubio and blank stares give way to interest.

article_metadata.title: As Republicans court Hispanic voters, Democratic groups attack Rubio, Bush | Miami Herald

Spend a little time at Melao Bakery or Espiritu De Vida bookstore, ask about Marco Rubio and blank stares give way to interest.
In a strip mall on a busy road in this fast-growing city, signs of hope emerge for Republicans trying to win the White House.
